snippet.title: Warhammer Online Production Video Podcast #7- Quests
snippet.description: This month, we present another of our animated podcasts and take a long look at an important piece of the MMORPG puzzle - Quests. We'll show you the innovations we are bringing to the questing system and show how we plan to deliver on the promise that "War is everywhere!" We'll showcase the variety of quest types and explain how the epic storyline of the Age of Reckoning figures into every one of our quests. Don't miss it!
